name: F1 GP Nippon no Chousen: Dome no Yabou
overview: Formula Nippon is a type of formula racing and the top level of single-seater racing in Japan. Formula Nippon evolved from the Japanese Formula 2000 series begun in 1973 by way of the Japanese Formula Two and Japanese Formula 3000 championships. For the most part, the Japanese racing series have closely followed their European counterparts in terms of technical regulations, but there have been some important exceptions. In Doyume no Yabou F1-Gp the player can also build his own formula 1 car choosing the different parts of the car and then chosing the driver that will test the car. After that he can see the test and races using different camera angles. Game Modes: 1 - Normal Mode: This is a sort of a story mode. 2 - Vs Run Mode: To play in these modes a memory card from the Normal mode is needed. Game modes are: - 1 player vs 2 Player - 1 Player vs Computer - Grand Prix Mode. Manufacturer's description: F1 authentic simulation was developed to build up a thorough pursuit of the fastest machines F1 think from the selection of parts, a reality. Design the machine according to the regulation of F1, I will repeat the settings in the test run. Put in a machine that is proud to Suzuka Circuit 3D modeling, will beat out the best time. Features: - First person perspective. - 2D & 3D graphics - Cartoon graphics - F1 Nippon Racing theme.
